privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Damu (hereinafter "Company") establishes and discloses this Privacy Policy in accordance with the Personal Information Protection Act to protect users' personal information and handle related grievances promptly and smoothly.

purpose.title: 1. Purpose of Processing Personal Information
purpose.intro: The Company processes personal information for the following purposes:
rows: Service membership, identity verification, age verification, fraud prevention
AI conversation service, friend matching service, personalized content

collection.title: 2. Personal Information Collected
requiredRows: Email, password (for email signup), nickname, date of birth, gender
AI conversation content, profile information, interests, usage history
Personality analysis results, matching preferences, match accept/reject records
Payment history, subscription status (card info stored by payment processor)
autoItems: Device information (OS, app version, device identifier)
Access logs, IP address, service usage records
Push token (when notification consent is given)

retention.title: 3. Retention Period of Personal Information
rows: Until account deletion (or upon individual deletion request)
retention.note: ※ Personal information is destroyed without delay upon account deletion. However, if retention is required by law, it will be stored for the required period before destruction.

thirdParty.title: 4. Disclosure to Third Parties
thirdParty.intro: The Company does not provide users' personal information to third parties in principle. However, exceptions are made in the following cases:
items: When the user has given prior consent
When required by law or upon request following legal procedures for investigation purposes

outsourcing.title: 5. Outsourcing of Personal Information Processing
outsourcing.intro: The Company outsources personal information processing for service provision as follows:
rows: AI service provision, authentication, push notifications, app analytics
Until contract termination (temporary processing during API calls)
outsourcing.note: ※ AI conversation content is stored on Company servers for service provision (maintaining conversation context). Google only processes data during API calls and does not store or use it for AI model training.

overseas.title: 6. Overseas Transfer of Personal Information
overseas.intro: The Company transfers personal information overseas for service provision:
rows: Conversation content, profile info, account info, app usage records

destruction.title: 7. Destruction of Personal Information
destruction.intro: The Company destroys personal information without delay when the retention period expires or the processing purpose is achieved:
items: Electronic files: Permanently deleted using irreversible methods
Paper documents: Shredded or incinerated

rights.title: 8. User Rights and How to Exercise Them
rights.intro: Users may exercise the following rights at any time:
rows: Request to stop processing personal information
rights.note: ※ We do not collect personal information from children under 14 years of age.

security.title: 9. Security Measures for Personal Information
security.intro: The Company takes the following measures to ensure the security of personal information:
items: Encryption of personal information (TLS for transmission, AES-256 for storage)
Access permission management and restrictions
Personal information access log retention
Security software installation and regular inspections

officer.title: 10. Privacy Officer
officer.note: For inquiries, complaints, or damage relief regarding personal information, please contact the above.

remedies.title: 11. Remedies for Rights Infringement
remedies.intro: If you need to report or consult about personal information infringement, please contact the following organizations:
items: Personal Information Infringement Report Center: privacy.kisa.or.kr / 118
Personal Information Dispute Mediation Committee: kopico.go.kr / 1833-6972
Supreme Prosecutors' Office Cyber Investigation Division: spo.go.kr / 1301
National Police Agency Cyber Bureau: cyberbureau.police.go.kr / 182

changes.title: 12. Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: This Privacy Policy is effective from January 1, 2026. Changes will be announced through in-app notifications 7 days in advance.

accountDeletion.title: Account Deletion Guide
accountDeletion.intro:
You can delete your account directly from the Haru app.
Please follow the instructions below to delete your account.

steps.title: Open the Haru App
steps.description: Open the Haru app and log in.

steps.title: Go to Settings
steps.description: Tap the My Page tab at the bottom right, then tap the Settings icon.

steps.title: Delete Account
steps.description: Tap Delete Account and follow the instructions.

warnings: All conversation history and data will be permanently deleted upon deletion.
If you have an active subscription, please cancel it first.
accountDeletion.contactInfo: If you have trouble deleting your account, please contact privacy@haruai.im.

article1.title: Article 1 (Purpose)
article1.content: These Terms govern the terms and procedures for using the AI friend service "Haru" (hereinafter "Service") provided by damu (hereinafter "Company"), and stipulate the rights, obligations, and responsibilities of the Company and users.

article2.title: Article 2 (Definitions)
definitions: "Service" refers to AI conversation, friend matching, and related supplementary services provided by the Company.
"User" refers to a member who uses the Service in accordance with these Terms.
"AI Friend" refers to an artificial intelligence-based conversation partner provided by the Company.
"Paid Service" refers to subscription services and additional features provided by the Company for a fee.

article3.title: Article 3 (Effect and Amendment of Terms)
items: These Terms become effective when posted on the service screen or otherwise notified to users.
The Company may amend these Terms within the scope permitted by applicable laws.
Changes to the Terms will be announced 7 days before the effective date. However, changes unfavorable to users will be announced 30 days in advance.
If you do not agree to the amended Terms, you may stop using the Service and withdraw.

article4.title: Article 4 (Formation of Use Agreement)
article4.content: The use agreement is formed when the user agrees to these Terms and completes registration. The Company may refuse registration or terminate the use agreement afterwards in the following cases:
items: If under 14 years of age
If using another person's information fraudulently
If previously lost eligibility to use the Service
If otherwise in violation of these Terms

article5.title: Article 5 (Change of User Information)
article5.content: Users must immediately update their information in the app settings or notify customer service when personal information changes.

article6.title: Article 6 (Provision of Services)
article6.content: The Company provides the following services:
services: Other services determined by the Company
items: The Service is provided 24 hours a day, 365 days a year in principle.
The Company may temporarily suspend the Service due to system maintenance, failures, etc.

article7.title: Article 7 (Change and Suspension of Services)
article7.content: The Company may change the Service as necessary for operational or technical reasons. Changes will be announced in advance with the details and effective date. The Company may suspend all or part of the Service in the following cases:
items: Regular system maintenance, expansion, and replacement
Force majeure such as natural disasters or national emergencies
Termination of contract with service providers

article8.title: Article 8 (Characteristics and Disclaimer of AI Service)
items: The AI Friend is based on artificial intelligence technology and is not a real person.
AI Friend responses are for informational purposes and do not replace professional advice (medical, legal, financial, etc.).
The Company does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or suitability of AI Friend responses.
Users should only use AI Friend responses as reference material, and are responsible for decisions made based on them.
The AI Friend learns from user conversations to provide personalized responses, but this is for service quality improvement and is not disclosed externally.

article9.title: Article 9 (Friend Matching Service)
items: The Company provides friend matching opportunities between users but does not guarantee matching results.
The Company is not responsible for interactions between matched users or the results thereof.
Users may not use information about others obtained through the matching service for purposes other than the Service.

article10.title: Article 10 (Paid Services and Payment)
items: The Company provides paid subscription services in addition to free services.
Types, fees, and usage periods of paid services are displayed separately in the app.
Payment follows app store policies (Apple App Store, Google Play Store).
Subscription services are automatically renewed; if not cancelled at least 24 hours before the renewal date, automatic payment will occur.

article11.title: Article 11 (Withdrawal and Refund)
article11.content: Withdrawal is possible within 7 days after purchase if the service has not been used. Withdrawal is restricted in the following cases:
items: If the service has been used after purchase
If the subscription period has passed
Refunds are processed according to each app store's policy.
If service use is impossible due to Company fault, refunds will be provided for the remaining period.

article12.title: Article 12 (User Obligations)
article12.content: Users must not engage in the following actions. Users must comply with applicable laws, these Terms, and service guidelines.
prohibited: Using another person's information fraudulently or registering false information
Interfering with the Company's service operations
Causing discomfort to other users (profanity, defamation, harassment, etc.)
Abusing AI Friend to create harmful content
Circumventing technical protection measures of the Service
Other actions that violate laws or these Terms

article13.title: Article 13 (Sanctions)
article13.content: The Company may take the following actions if a user violates Article 12. The Company will notify users when sanctions are imposed. Users may appeal sanctions through customer service.
measures: Permanent suspension and termination of membership

article14.title: Article 14 (Copyright and Intellectual Property)
items: Copyright for content included in the Service (AI responses, design, software, etc.) belongs to the Company.
Copyright for content created by users within the Service belongs to the users.
Users may not commercially use information obtained through the Service without prior consent from the Company.

article15.title: Article 15 (Privacy Protection)
article15.content: The Company protects users' personal information in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

article16.title: Article 16 (Disclaimer)
items: The Company is not responsible for service interruptions due to force majeure such as natural disasters, war, or telecommunications provider service interruptions.
The Company is not responsible for service disruptions caused by user fault.
The Company does not guarantee the effects users expect from the Service.
The Company has no obligation to intervene in disputes between users and is not responsible for damages arising therefrom.

article17.title: Article 17 (Dispute Resolution)
items: In case of disputes related to service use, the Company and user will negotiate in good faith for amicable resolution.
If negotiation fails, the competent court shall be the court with jurisdiction over the Company's location.
Interpretation and application of these Terms shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of Korea.

appendix.title: Addendum
appendix.content: These Terms are effective from January 1, 2026.

safetyPolicy.title: Safety Policy
safetyPolicy.intro: Damu (hereinafter "Company") prioritizes the safety of all users, especially children and adolescents. This policy explains our commitment and procedures for creating a safe environment and responding to harmful content within the Haru service.

emergency.title: Emergency Reporting
emergency.content: If you discover child abuse, exploitation, or an immediate danger situation, please contact local emergency services immediately.

commitment.title: 1. Our Commitment to Safety
commitment.content: The Company applies a zero-tolerance policy towards all forms of harmful content and behavior, including Child Sexual Abuse and Exploitation (CSAE). We are committed to maintaining a safe and healthy community environment.

ageRestriction.title: 2. Age Restriction Policy
ageRestriction.intro: The Haru service is only available to users aged 14 and above.
items: Age is verified through date of birth confirmation during registration.
Accounts confirmed to be under 14 years old will be immediately restricted.
Providing false age information may result in permanent suspension.
Some features may be restricted for minors (aged 14-17).

prohibitedContent.title: 3. Prohibited Content and Behavior
prohibitedContent.intro: The following content and behaviors are strictly prohibited:
items: Child Sexual Abuse Material (CSAM) or any content suggesting it
Grooming behavior targeting children
Sexual approaches or inappropriate conversation attempts towards minors
Content promoting child abuse, neglect, or exploitation
Sexual depictions of real or fictional children
Illegally recorded content or content recorded without consent
Content promoting violence, self-harm, or suicide
Hate speech, discrimination, or harassment

reporting.title: 4. How to Report
reporting.intro: If you discover inappropriate content or suspicious behavior, please report it using the following methods:

inApp.title: In-App Reporting
items: Long press on the message you want to report
Select "Report" from the menu that appears
Select report type and provide details

email.title: Email Reporting
email.content: For urgent or detailed reports, please contact safety@haruai.im. Child safety-related reports are prioritized and processed within 24 hours.

response.title: 5. Report Processing Procedures
response.intro: The Company responds promptly to reports according to the following procedures:
items: Child safety-related reports: Review and action within 24 hours
General harmful content reports: Review and action within 48 hours
Immediate removal of content upon violation confirmation
Warning, temporary suspension, or permanent suspension for violating accounts
Report to relevant authorities when legal action is required
Notification of processing results to reporters (except anonymous reports)

cooperation.title: 6. Law Enforcement Cooperation
cooperation.content: The Company actively cooperates with relevant agencies including police, prosecutors, and child protection organizations on matters related to child exploitation and abuse. When there is a court warrant or legal request, we provide necessary information in accordance with applicable laws. Upon discovery of CSAM, we immediately report to relevant authorities and also report to the National Center for Missing & Exploited Children (NCMEC).

education.title: 7. Safety Education and Prevention
education.content: To create a safe service environment, the Company conducts regular safety training for employees and provides users with guides for safe online activities. Our AI system is continuously improved to detect harmful content in advance.

contact.title: 8. Safety Policy Inquiries
contact.content: For inquiries about the safety policy, please contact safety@haruai.im.

updates.title: 9. Policy Changes
updates.content: This safety policy is effective from January 1, 2026. We will notify you in advance through in-service announcements when the policy changes.
